name: Scarab
text:
0:0.
At the start of each round, if this is the top of your discard pile, gain Sight 1.

name: Become Machine
text: 1:1, Fleeting, transform each of your cards later in the story into an 0:X ${1003}, where X is its cost.

name: Desert
text: 2:0, return the last card in the story to its owner's hand. If there is none, +3.

name: Generator
text:
4:4.
At the start of each round, if this is the top of your discard pile, Build 1.

name: Pocket Watch
text:
4:1, draw 2.
Costs X less, where X is the number of times you've passed this round.

name: Phoenix
text: 5:5, Fleeting, create a ${4} in your hand.

name: Symbiosis
text: 6:6, if this is nourished, your opponent discards the leftmost card of their hand.

name: Sun
text:
8:8, Visible.
At the start of each round, if this is the top of your discard pile, Inspired 2.

name: Bee
text: 0:1, visible

name: Butterfly
text: 0:0, nourish 1 (The next card you resolve is worth 1 more point)

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Beehive
text: 2:0, swarm 3 (After your next draw step, create 3 ${126} in your hand)

name: Stable
text: 3:3, store the top card of your discard pile in this card. This card's effect becomes to add one of the stored card to your hand.

name: Vulture
text:
3:3.
At the start of each round, if this is the top of your discard pile, create a ${4} in your hand.

name: Honey
text: 4:X, swarm X, where X is the number of rounds you have won

name: Beekeep
text: 5:5, store all 0-cost cards in your discard pile in this card. This card's effect becomes to add them back to your discard pile.

name: Foundry
text: 5:5-X, Build X, where X is the number of cards in the story before this card

name: Mute
text: 1:1, restrict 1 (Your opponent can't play their leftmost unrestricted card next turn)

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Fishing Boat
text:
2:0, tutor 1 3 times.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Charcoal
text: 3:4, visible, discard a card

name: Angler
text:
4:4, visible, tutor 1.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Desert
text:
4:0, modal:
0: +1, later cards this round are worth -2

1-2: Reset
3+: +4

name: Force
text: 5:6, Flare.

name: Nightmare
text: 8:6, opponent discards 2

name: Ifrit
text: 8:7, later cards this round are worth -1
